# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We are committed to maintaining a secure ecosystem for our users. Security updates and patches are prioritized for the latest stable release of the `TapCounter-Mobile-Performance-Tracker-React-Native-App`.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| Latest  | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take security vulnerabilities very seriously. If you discover a security issue, please follow these steps to report it:

1.  **DO NOT** open a public issue.
2.  Send an email to our dedicated security team at: `chirag127.security@users.noreply.github.com`.
3.  In your email, please include:
    *   A clear and concise description of the vulnerability.
    *   Steps to reproduce the vulnerability.
    *   Any relevant technical details, such as affected versions, code snippets, or configuration.
    *   If applicable, proof-of-concept code or a demonstration.
    *   Your contact information for follow-up.

Once we receive your report, we will acknowledge receipt within **48 hours** and will work diligently to address the issue. We will provide updates on our progress and will release a fix as soon as possible.

## Responsible Disclosure

We adhere to a responsible disclosure policy. We will not pursue legal action against researchers who act in good faith and follow this policy. We encourage researchers to be transparent and to coordinate with us throughout the disclosure process. We aim to give ample time for us to fix and release patches before any public disclosure.
